review_title: Ambitious but with a big heart
pros: The team! Lots of talent, committment, and creative people trying to work wonders with limited resources
The people were lovely; really passionate about what they do and nice to talk to, which makes the working day enjoyable. There is a lot of freedom to come up with new ideas and no day is the same.
cons: Resource and pay do not cover the amount of work that needs doing.

review_title: Ambitious, caring and great place to grow
pros:
+ Extremely ambitious for a charity
+ Great colleagues and teams who are extremely passionate
+ Chance to really grow and develop
+ Open and honest communication
cons:
- Salaries are often below industry standard as it is charity
- Investment and funding can be tight at times
- Workload can be a high with pressure at times but great chance to grow and develop

pros: Varied, interesting work. Agile, fast moving organisation.
cons: Woefully under pay staff. Work life balance could be better.

pros: Very friendly team. Great places to work
cons: As a charity money is always tight
